key.description: User name of the entry (no unicity enforced)

text.description: Text used in Note Text in Engineering Note Template, or when no choice is made for this list of values entry in an Engineering Note

prefix.description: String to prepend before text in computed Note Text

suffix.description: String to append to text in computed Note Text

values.description: List of possible values defined at Engineering Note Template level. If a choice is made among those values, corresponding string will replace text in Engineering Note Text.

choice.description: Index of chosen value, must be between 0 (no choice) and values array length (included)
